alert.note: Alert for Lincoln; Logan; Oklahoma (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 13 at 11:41PM CDT until August 14 at 12:30AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Oklahoma County in central Oklahoma... Central Lincoln County in central Oklahoma... Southeastern Logan County in central Oklahoma... * Until 1230 AM CDT. * At 1141 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Luther, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Northeastern Oklahoma City, eastern Edmond, Chandler, Choctaw, Jones, Stroud, Luther, Davenport, Wellston, Sparks, Warwick, Kendrick, and Fallis. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
